#summary Contents of the DFTEditor folder.

== Overview ==

Checks its directory for .wav files.
Creates a file: _filename_ - ".wav" + ".mono5ms" from all .wav files (if this file does not already exist).<br>
For output specification of .mono5ms files see DataFormatsAndConstants<br>

== Building ==

From DOS Prompt:<br>
>*c*<br>
c.bat deletes existing class files and runs ANT<br>
Output: DFTEditor.jar<br>

== Running ==
From DOS Prompt:<br>
>*r*<br>
r.bat is simply "java -Xms2g -jar DFTEditor.jar"<br>
_*Note: The -Xms2g option requests that the JVM be given 2GB of RAM.<br>
It is only needed for larger .wav files (more than 7 minutes or so).<br>  
If this option causes problems (such as "insufficient memory"), simply remove it.*_<br>

== Files ==

_Main Class:_<br>
*DFTEditor.java*: creates .mono5ms files from .wav files (see !FileConvert.java), prompts user for ".mono5ms" file to load, initializes main data structures, and creates GUI components<br>
<br>
_MVC Classes:_<br>
*DFTController.java*: Handles mouse events, navigation bar events<br>
*!ActionHandler.java*:(_Controller_) Handles menu bar events<br>
*DFTView*: Handles matrix display of file data<br>
*DFTModel.java*: Defines common data structures<br>
<br>
_Output Classes:_<br>
*Harmonics.java*: Creates, appends to ".harmonics" files from user selection of TFA data in corresponding ".mono5ms" files _(This functionality is still being developed)_.<br>
<br>
_Main Helper Class:_<br>
*DFTUtils.java*: Contains helper functions used by multiple classes<br>
<br>
_Classes with specific functions:_<br>
*!FileConvert.java*: Creates .out5ms from .wav files<br>
*!AudioPlayer.java*: Plays PCM data at run time<br>
*!CreateWavelets.java*: Mirrors wavelet generation code in main.c<br>
*!FileTools.java*: Displays open/save prompts<br>
*!LogLinear.java*: Code for harmonic to PCM conversion<br>
<br>
